text: Karjolsteinen (The Carriage Stone) is a 1977 Norwegian drama movie directed by Knut Andersen and was based on the novel of the same name by Sigbjørn Hølmebakk. It stars Marit Grønhaug, Sverre Anker Ousdal, Erik Øksnes, Grethe Ryan, Arne Lindtner Næss. ==Other websites== * * Filmweb.no: Karjolsteinen Category:1977 drama movies Category:Norwegian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Knut Andersen
title: Karjolsteinen
